strings.string: If you have selected 'custom phrase' please type it here
You should enter a phrase or word to display here
Thanks for using Runner Attitude Watchface. Go for a run!
Running is about finding your inner peace, and so is a life well lived
Run to add life to your days.
Ask nothing from your running, and you'll get more than you ever imagined.
It being a runner what matters, not how fast or how far you could run.
Winning doesn't always mean getting first place; it means getting the best out of yourself.
You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
If it doesn’t challenge you, it won't change you.
The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
Someone who is busier than you is running right now.
Don’t fear moving slowly forward…fear standing still
A one hour run is 4% of your day. No excuses.
One run can change your day. Many runs can change your life.
Run the first two-thirds of the race with your head and the last third with your heart.
Breathe in strength and breathe out weakness
Don't procrastinate, today is your day
Your mind will quit a thousand times before your body will. Feel the fear and do it anyway!
Look in the mirror. That is your competition.
There is not one body type that equates to success. Accept the body you have and be the best you can be with it.
Everyday is a good day to run. Isn't it?
Never give up, keep trying and improving
Compete against yourself and admire the others
Run and free up your mind
You can either experience the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The choice is yours
“Your passion is waiting for your courage to catch up
Magic is believing in yourself. If you can make that happen, you can make anything happen
Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart
Work hard in silence, let your success be the noise
Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits
Go the extra mile. It’s never crowded there
We can do anything we want to if we stick to it long enough
You’re so much stronger than your excuses
Don’t tell everyone your plans, instead show them your results
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are
If you can dream it, you can do it
You can do anything you set your mind to
You never know what you can do until you try
A winner is a dreamer who never gives up
The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me
Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going
Words can inspire, thoughts can provoke, but only action truly brings you closer to your dreams
Don’t stop when you are tired. Stop when you are done
Motivation may be what starts you off, but it’s habit that keeps you going back for more
It might not be easy but it’ll be worth it
You will never always be motivated, so you must learn to be disciplined
Allow phrase to continue moving on Low Power Mode
